showScoreExcerpt:
"Ultimately, Pepe’s splendid production provides a new insight into 'American Buffalo'—as a play more about friendship than about American business (you’ll see, in the ending I dare not reveal). Under Mamet’s tough iconoclastic exterior, there’s heart and humanity that ultimately triumphs at Circle in the Square."

Read more
